STP.TXT: This transaction already Closed. Cannot edit this Transaction.
Document status will be changed to “Cancelled” and document will not appear in the sales. Do you want to continue ?
This transaction already Canceled. Cannot edit this Transaction.
This transaction already Closed. Cannot edit this Transaction.
This transaction is being approved. Cannot edit this transaction.

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Document status will be changed to “Cancelled” and document will not appear in the sales. Do you want to continue ?')
MlsTrans('Cannot edit document with approval process')
MlsTrans('This transaction already Closed. Cannot edit this Transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction already Canceled. Cannot edit this Transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction is being approved. Cannot edit this transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction already have Applied Amount')
MlsTrans('This transaction already '&IF({0,19} = 'Y', 'Canceled', 'Closed') &'. Cannot cancel this Transaction.')
MlsTrans('Cannot Cancel document with approval process')
MlsTrans('This transaction is being approved. Cannot Cancel this transaction.')
MlsTrans('You Can not Cancel Document from other System ')
MlsTrans('You do not have Rights to Cancel Document')
